creator: comic lover
descriptionHtml:
'Breeze Sort' has revived the classic gameplay and fun of solitaire game. Different levels of difficulty are waiting for you to challenge! The exquisite artistic design will bring you a new fresh feeling! And you can play it anywhere with offline mode!

Featuring:
- Classic gameplay
- Offline available
- New artistic design
- Achievement system
- Breezy melody as background music
- Single, dual and four color for difficulties to play
- Hint & Revocation without times limit
- Various props
- Daily challenge
- Smart switch for both left and right hand
- Timing function
- Phone & Pad support
- Multiple language
- The function of saving progress
- Automatically screen switch

Hope you will enjoy the game!
descriptionShort: Breeze Sort, solitaire with art & music, just like breeze blows into your heart

appDetails.developerAddress: 辽宁省大连市高新园区小平岛海悦山
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Upgraded the UI
2. Added: unlock & purchase backgrounds according to the level
3. Fixed background black bug after a redownload

title: Breeze Sort-Spider Solitaire With Artistic Concept

container.value: 辽宁省大连市高新园区小平岛海悦山

creator: comic lover
descriptionHtml:
◇ A collection of multiple puzzle games
◇ 2048, Sudoku, Spider Solitaire
◇ Simple and clear, easy for beginners to use
◇ No need to play on the Internet, support multiple languages

Here, you can experience the fun 2048, professional card game, and challenging puzzle Sudoku
A collection of classic decompression games combining cards and puzzles, simple rules and easy to use
A variety of gameplay, healing design style, decompressing the gospel of game lovers, making people can not stop
Know your Sudoku best and bring you an unprecedented brain-burning experience
A variety of difficulty levels, the classic gameplay is reproduced, and the decompression is no longer monotonous
Simple numbers, endless thinking, rigorous logic, fun to solve problems
The pleasant and relaxing melody can be switched at will, relax and relieve stress
The screen is simple, the hand feels great, the wonderful showdown, drives away the unhappy

Heart Healing 2048
-Classic 2048 refreshing
-Healing colors, the screen is simple and clear
-Smooth combination sliding, silky decompression feeling
-Do 2048 who knows you best

Heart Healing Solitaire
-Classic Windows Spider Solitaire core gameplay
-The cards are big and clear
-Unlimited undo
-Unlimited smart tips
-A wealth of props to help you pass the level smoothly
-Exquisite healing desktop and card design
-Daily challenges
-Support left and right hand switching
-Support mobile phones and tablets
-Single game timing function
-Single, two-color, four-color difficulty options are available

Heart Healing Sudoku
-Perfect embodiment of classic Sudoku
-Undo, erase, note, and remind functions can be used at will
-Concise picture style, clear Sudoku nine square grid
-Precise and clear highlighting tips
-Timing, step counting, multiple data to help you pass levels

If you like Healing Town or you have any questions, please support us
Hope you enjoy our game and have a good time
descriptionShort: Puzzle games with 2048,Sudoku,Solitaire

appDetails.developerAddress: 辽宁省大连市高新园区小平岛海悦山
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Added 2048
2. Optimize the process
3. Fix old version bug

-Classic Windows Spider Solitaire core gameplay
-The cards are big and clear
-Unlimited undo
-Unlimited smart tips
-A wealth of props to help you pass the level smoothly
-Exquisite healing desktop and card design
-Daily challenges
-Support left and right hand switching
-Support mobile phones and tablets
-Single game timing function
-Single, two-color, four-color difficulty options are available

Heart Healing Sudoku
-Perfect embodiment of classic Sudoku
-Undo, erase, note, and remind functions can be used at will
-Concise picture style, clear Sudoku nine square grid
-Precise and clear highlighting tips
-Timing, step counting, multiple data to help you pass levels

If you like Healing Town or you have any questions, please support us
Hope you enjoy our game and have a good time

title: Healing Town - 2048 Sudoku

container.value: 辽宁省大连市高新园区小平岛海悦山

creator: comic lover
descriptionHtml:
There’s a mysterious town, whenever you’re stressed out, it calls you to come over.
 
“Come here.” You heard such a call. Then you were unconscious.
 
When you woke up, you saw a blanket of stars that stretched to infinity. You heard joyous laughter coming from people around.
 
Are you ready to begin this soothing journey?
 
Soothing Solitaire is a collection of relaxing yet addictive classic logic games including SOLITAIRE, SPIDER, 2048, and SUDOKU. Play games and unlock different themes, card backs, and game music.
 
Key Features:
-Relaxing design style, with different themes, card backs, and music
-No data is needed; the game is completely offline
-Classic, battle, and challenge mode, choose whatever you like
-Different difficulty levels
-Unlimited undo and tips
-Easy to play
 
Get ready to have fun with Soothing Solitaire, the OFFLINE, and CLASSIC games of solitaire, spider, 2048, and sudoku!
descriptionShort: A collection of classic games including SOLITAIRE, SPIDER, 2048, and SUDOKU.
